creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, two photomechanical illustrations of sketch-like figures, text, and designs printed in offset lithography on speckled beige wove paper covers; 20 pp.
inscription: P.1, black ink marker: For / Ms. Fly / DON.
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Characters ...drawn from the sketchbooks of Donald King
